channel.title: Dozer on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Dozer on Universal

item.title: E00952
item.description: Caterpillar D4H dozer, parts machine. Final drives & transmission available. Please contact us for parts / component price & availability.

item.title: E02562
item.description: Caterpillar D5B, E-rops Cab, Cat 3306DI engine with 105HP (78kW), semi U-blade with tilt, 3 speed powershift transmission, drawbar, cutting edge 70% remaining, undercarriage on average 80% remaining, new carrier rollers, new sprockets, 560mm pads, 11.500 Kgs operating weight. Machine has new paint, is workshop tested and is in very good and clean condition.

item.description: Caterpillar D5B, E-rops Cab, Cat 3306DI engine with 105HP (78kW), semi U-blade with tilt, 3 speed powershift transmission, drawbar, cutting edge 70% remaining, undercarriage on average 80% remaining, new carrier rollers, new sprockets, 560mm pads, 11.500 Kgs operating weight. item.title: E04561
item.description: Caterpillar D8T Dozer, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C15 ACERT Technology engine with 359HP (268kW), Tier 4 Interim, EPA, 4 barrel SS-ripper with hydr. pin puller, differential steering, wrist control steering, front & rear work lights, rear view camera. Machine comes straight out of work and is in very clean condition. Currently located in Houston Texas, USA. Machine is available for sale or rent, subject to terms and conditions.

item.description: Caterpillar D6R XL Series II, E-rops cab with air conditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C9 ACERT Technology engine with 185HP (138kW), EPA certified, 3 speed powershift transmission, semi U-blade with tilt, differential steering, wrist control steering, undercarriage on average 75% remaining, 610mm shoes, rear view camera, drawbar, front and rear work lights, operating weight 19.000 Kgs, CE marked. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.
